item.title: Big Butterfly Month 2021 Kerala
item.description:
The Big Butterfly Month is a celebration of butterflies aimed at conducting a nationwide citizen science survey to help us assess the health of our environment.

BBM Kerala BioBlitz

This campaign coducted by iNat Kerala Community & KBMN. Upload your obseservation to iNaturalist.org https://www.inaturalist.org/projects/big-butterfly-month-2021-kerala
